Reviews.Title: Sanyo DP46849
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: I purchased this model television in July 2009. Beginning in June 2011, lines appear across the screen and sometimes half the screen goes black. I was told it needs a new LCD panel, which Sanyo will not cover. The new LCD panel costs $1000.00.Search the internet...this is a common problem with Sanyo televisions.

Reviews.Title: Great tv after quick fix!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Justaguy
Reviews.Content: great tv after $3.00 quick fix!  i had the same dark side,lines etc that others were mad about! it turns out it was just the lcd panel (ribbons) flexing wrong!  fixed it in about 20 mins or so!  do not throw it away!!!!!follow link to fix it yourself!  or have someone that knows repairs follow this advice!  enjoy and be careful and dont get shocked!!!!!!!!  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=purk_SyiT44  btw- my tv works as new again! awesome-

Reviews.Title: WAITING FOR RECALL OR CLASS ACTION LAW SUIT.
Reviews.Author: D. Curreri "megaflik"
Reviews.Content: Great picture for 2 years, but then the right half of screen went dark. shortly after then the other half of screen went white with noise or static lines. Was told by Sanyo that it was the board and would cost upwards of $600.00 to replace. Since it was out of warranty they would do nothing to help me. This is a very common fault. Search it out. STAY AWAY..

Reviews.Title: TV FAILS TO TURN ON - less than 1 year old
Reviews.Author: Surfer Girl 27
Reviews.Content: Bought a Sanyo 47 inch LCD TV from Walmart less than 1 year ago & it kept turning off randomly for no reason.  We just dealt with it for awhile, but tonight my husband & I read TONS of reviews about other Sanyo TV's doing the same thing, & worse - turning off & staying off & not working at all!  I saw this & read it to my husband who said, "At least we don't have that problem."  Minutes later, we did.  Our TV just turned off & won't go on anymore.  NEVER buying anything Sanyo again, and I cannot believe they do not care anything at all for their brand name.  Don't believe me?  Just Google Sanyo TV problems, you'll see thousands of complaints, with NO response or help from Sanyo.

Reviews.Title: WARNING - BUYER BEWARE
Reviews.Author: Arrf
Reviews.Content: Google Sanyo TV problems. Lots of reports of their screens going black in a few years. I have a DP46848 and apparently, mine is not the only model having this problem.

Reviews.Title: SANYO 46" HDTV LCD DP46849
Reviews.Author: lynnie
Reviews.Content: BOUGHT THIS TV IN JANUARY 2010 AND NOW HALF THE SCREEN GOES BLACK!  I AM SO UPSET THAT THIS TV HAS ONLY LASTED 3 1/2 YEARS. WILL NEVER BUY A SANYO AGAIN.

Reviews.Title: No issues after 4 years
Reviews.Author: Gray J Collins
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV for 4 years now.  No issues at all I can honestly say... purchased at the WAL store but that makes no difference.  There may be bad reviews for this TV but mine's been perfect (knock on wood).  Now I did purchase a Polaroid 47" before this one... and it DID have all the same issues that others describe here for the this TV.  One thing I learned was that these TV's are all made in China (you get what you pay for) and the boards on them are meant to go out after a certain time.  They all have 1-piece boards of course, and it costs 4x the price of the TV to replace.  not worth it.  For the polaroid however, if you opened it up and checked for bad capacitors (swollen ones) you can replace them with slightly higher capacitors and that fixes the problem 75% of the time.  If it's just going to the garbage you might as well open it up and see if you have bad capacitors!  Search on polaroid and capacitor to find the issue and description of the fix.  But this Sanyo is doing just fine after 4 years :)

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: ljm
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv in early Dec.In the three months I,ve been watching it I,ve had zero problems with it.It was easy to set up,and has all the connections I needed to use HDMI and my older DVD recorder,as well as,plugging it into my stereo.The price was great,too.I don't play video games on my TV,so I can't say how that would look.So,in short,I love this TV and whole-heartedly recommend it .

ProductInfo.Name: Sanyo DP46849 46" 1080p LCD HDTV w/ ATSC Tuner, 3 HDMI and 2 Component - MFG Refurbished
